alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:19AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison, Franklin, Crawford, northern Sebastian and southeastern Washington Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 818 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles west of Greenland to 4 miles south of Devils Den State Park to near Moffett. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Ozark... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Alma... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Mulberry... Greenland... Dyer... Altus... Winslow... Branch... Denning... Chester... St. Paul... Rudy... Wiederkehr Village... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 1 and 42. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern and west central Arkansas.
